summary: Runes have been given additional effects.
descriptionHtml:
Runes have been given additional effects.

Fire - Disarm and Stagger.
Lightning - Paralyze for 5 seconds.
Frost - Slows them and weakens their armor.
Frenzy - Causes the person/group that steps on the rune to go into a frenzy for 30 seconds.
Calm - Calms the person/group that steps on the rune for 30 seconds. May not be 100% effective.
Rally - Emboldens a person/group with extra life and stamina for 30 seconds. may not be 100% effective.
Fear - Scares a person/group for 30 seconds.

All of these have a base cost of 100 magic which is lower then normal. they have the same charge time and level requirment do a small amount of damage.
the damage has been reduced to around 5 points.
The pre-placed runes are not effected by this change.
I have added the Frenzy, Calm, Rally, and Fear tomes to the apprentice illusion vendor list. Farengar and Drevis Neloren are two people that sell them.
Casting Calm on a target multiple times that is not hostile can make it hostile.
Casting Rally multiple times on a non-hostile target can make it go hostile.

Manual installation
Extract the esp and drop it in the Skyrim data folder.

NMM installation
Download it to the manager and check the box next to it.
